items.name: MicroService | Registration-Center Config-Center Observability LB etc...
Middleware | Mysql Redis Kafka ES etc...
Devops | Shell K8S Istio Docker etc...

items.summary:
## OasisApp incubates from Weibo, a inns like app.

* We worked all the way from 0 to 1 million dau.
* Lead Architect Design
    - Sep code across all departments when dau surge on first launch
    - Refactor using microservice approach after version 2.0 
    - Using K8S to Orchestrate all our springboot services
* Analyse, Design and Coding
    - Analyse requirements, using UML tools(drawio in my case) to make everything crystal clear, then review the cases inside our team
    - Coding using OOP approach, design pattern. Writing readable, distributable, scalable codes
    - We Write Junit test cases when possible, and writes integration test cases when the time is feasible, and keeps codes quality high
* Tech stack
    - Springboot
    - Middlewares: Mysql, Redis, Elasticsearch, Kafka
    - Docker Container
    - k8s sidecar mode(We using istio) to make services and its runtimes(which in our case JVM and the docker container) observable.
    - Using K8S to make our app scalable, gray scale release possible
* Achievements
    - From 0 to 300K Dau, from 300K Dau to 1M Dau
    - Eventually Consistency in High concurrency scenes
    - App goes from monoservice to microservice, and the experience gained from making that happen is highly valuable and recognizable
items.title: App Oasis

items.summary:
## Weibo machine learning sub-projects

* Weibo Images Categorizing - sub category project
* Categorize Weather Images for Weibo weather app. 
* Categorize similar background music.
* Tech stack
    - Python
    - Tensorflow
    - Springboot
    - Using Kafka, Redis to push and pull data across teams
    - ELK to collects logs  
* Achievements
    - Reduce works done by manually categorize images, boost efficiency.
    - Boost Weibo weather app user experience and our user spend more time on our app
items.title: Machine Learning

## Sales Website

* Tech stack

* Achievements
